WITH LatestApplications AS ( SELECT tca.dog_id, ts.course_id, MAX(tca.applied_at) AS max_applied_at FROM training_course_application tca JOIN training_session ts ON tca.session_id = ts.session_id AND ts.is_deleted = 0 JOIN dog d ON tca.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND tca.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY tca.dog_id, ts.course_id ) SELECT MIN(tca.application_id) AS applicationId, d.dog_id AS dogId, CASE WHEN SUM(tca.status = 'CANCELLED') > 0 THEN 'CANCELLED' WHEN SUM(tca.status = 'WAITING') > 0 THEN 'WAITING' WHEN SUM(tca.status = 'APPLIED') > 0 THEN 'APPLIED' ELSE MIN(tca.status) END AS applicationStatus, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tca.reject_reason ORDER BY tca.reject_reason SEPARATOR ', ') AS rejectReason,
tc.course_id AS courseId, tc.tags AS tags, tc.title AS title, tc.description AS description, tc.main_image AS mainImage, tc.location AS location, tc.lesson_form AS lessonForm, tc.type AS type,
CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(MIN(ts.session_date), '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(MAX(ts.session_date), '%Y-%m-%d') ) AS sessionSchedule,
SUM(ts.price) AS price,
d.name AS dogName FROM training_course_application tca JOIN dog d ON tca.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 JOIN training_session ts ON tca.session_id = ts.session_id AND ts.is_deleted = 0 JOIN training_course tc ON ts.course_id = tc.course_id AND tc.is_deleted = 0 JOIN LatestApplications la ON la.dog_id = tca.dog_id AND la.course_id = tc.course_id AND la.max_applied_at = tca.applied_at WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND tca.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY tc.course_id, d.dog_id, d.name, tc.tags, tc.title, tc.description, tc.main_image, tc.location, tc.lesson_form, tc.type ORDER BY MAX(tca.applied_at) DESC
